```{r}

# Importamos las librerias 

library(datasets)
library(moments) # curtuosis skewnees--
library(modeest)
library(ggplot2)
library(vcd)
library(corrplot)
library(MVN)
library(mvShapiroTest)
library(fdth) # Tablas de freceuencias, historigramas
library(summarytools)
library(dplyr)

rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))

```

```{r}
# Cargado de datos

data <- datasets::rock

data
```
